name: Hampton Inn & Suites Camarillo

reviews.text: Loved this hotel. We had a 2Q room with the sleeper sofa. Our family of 5 (3 teenage daughters) fit into this room with room to spare! The rooms were clean and large. The staff was very friendly and helpful. Breakfast was good. Would recommend staying at this hotel.
reviews.title: Good Hotel for Family 0f 5
nice rooms, lousy food
reviews.text: Location and room quality was fine (though I got two queen beds instead of the one king I had reserved...since I was only one person the two smaller beds did me little good)..the only complaint I have is that the much vaunted "manager's reception" was cancelled without notice the day I was there, and the breakfast next morning was subminimal, no hot food except for some gelatinous egg/cheese combo that was inedible..the staff at breakfast were wandering around aimlessly when they should have been filling all those lonely empty pans waiting for food....I think that evening/morning management must have had some problems with their culinary staff.
-Very pleasant and helpful staff (emailed my bill for me, rang me when I received snail mail)
reviews.title: Perfect Hotel in Camarillo

reviews.text: -Great location next to the Camarillo Outlets.
reviews.title: Newer Hotel, Good Location

likes.liked: — We've had good luck with the Hampton chain of hotels, this was up to their standards.
likes.disliked: — Bottom sheets kept coming off of bed while sleeping. You end up sleeping directly on the mattress.

aka: Hampton Inn & Suites Camarillo Hotel Camarillo
